name: Magic Encyclopedia 3: Illusions
overview: "Alawar Entertainment" brings the latest chapter "Magic Encyclopedia 3: Illusions" to the series of magic puzzle games "Magic Book". In this work, the School of Magic was attacked, and the evil wizard changed the original appearance of countless objects around the world and gathered an unstoppable legion. Join Catherine's team and learn about illusions with her to defeat the enemy and save the school.
